snippet.title: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Team Ninja Talks Soulsborne Influence and More
snippet.description: Team Ninja producer Masaaki Yamagiwa discusses how the studio, most famous for Ninja Gaiden, Dead or Alive, and most recently Nioh, came to make a dark-fantasy Soulsborne game set in  China's Three Kingdoms period.
